name: places/ChIJewyRcZZZwokRhYqDCrV6WMI
formattedAddress: 41 5th Avenue, 1A/1B, 41 5th Ave #1a, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 41 5th Avenue, 1A/1B, 41 5th Ave #1a, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
I cannot express my gratitude enough for the incredible care I received from Dr. Hosny. After struggling with persistent back and leg pain that seemed resistant to other treatments, I was fortunate enough to find Dr. Hosny, whose expertise and compassionate approach made all the difference in my journey to recovery.

From the moment I walked into Dr. Hosny's clinic, I knew I was in capable hands. His warm and attentive staff immediately put me at ease, creating an environment that felt more like a partnership in my healing journey rather than just another patient-doctor relationship.

What sets Dr. Hosny apart is his unparalleled commitment to understanding the root causes of pain. Unlike other doctors I had seen, Dr. Hosny took the time to conduct a thorough examination, carefully listening to my concerns and history. His diagnostic skills are truly exceptional, as he was able to pinpoint the underlying issues contributing to my back and leg pain when others had fallen short.

Dr. Hosny's treatment plan was not only comprehensive but also tailored to my specific needs. He integrated cutting-edge techniques with a holistic approach, emphasizing the importance of lifestyle adjustments alongside targeted therapies. This personalized approach made a significant impact on my overall well-being, and I began to experience relief sooner than I could have imagined.

One of the aspects I appreciate most about Dr. Hosny is his commitment to patient education. He took the time to explain each step of the treatment process, ensuring I was fully informed and actively involved in my own recovery. This level of transparency and patient empowerment is truly refreshing and sets Dr. Hosny apart as a healthcare professional who genuinely cares about the well-being of his patients.

Thanks to Dr. Hosny's expertise, my back and leg pain have significantly diminished, allowing me to reclaim my life and pursue activities that were once out of reach. If you're searching for a dedicated and knowledgeable physician who goes above and beyond to provide effective pain relief, Dr. Hosny is the answer.

originalText.text: I don't know where I'd be without Dr. Hosny! I messed up my knee real bad playing basketball and could barely walk it hurt so much. Went to see Dr. Hosny and he was real concerned and scheduled me for surgery at his friend's cinic right away to fix it. He told me everything that would happen during the surgery and made me feel totally comfortable. After the surgery my knee healed up perfect and I'm not hobbling around anymore. I can walk normal again and play with my kids without that awful pain. Dr. Hosny and is a life saver! His whole staff took such good care of me too. They were real friendly and helped me every step of the way. I tell everyone who needs a pain management doc to see Dr. Hosny. He's so understanding and really knows how to fix even the worst injuries. My knee feels better then ever thanks to him! A++++ doc!

originalText.text: I cant believe how great Dr. Hosny is! I'v been suffering from terrible back pain for months and it was so bad I could barely get out of bed. But after seeing Dr. Hosny he was so attentive to my problem and perscribed me some medications and physical therapy. Now just a few weeks later I'm like a new person and can finally move around again without that awful pain! Dr. Hosny is amazing, he really listened and helped fix my back so quick. I wish I saw him months ago! The staff is so nice to and they really care about getting you better. Anyone with back pain issues should see Dr. Hosny right away!

originalText.text: I recently had back surgery and was experiencing severe pain afterward. Dr. Hosny was very understanding and compassionate towards my needs, and was able to quickly establish a pain management plan that minimized my discomfort. üòäüëç He prescribed strong medications, which worked wonders, and took the time to answer all my questions and address my concerns. I felt very comfortable and confident in his abilities. His office was clean, organized, and conducive to a healthy and healing environment. Thank you, Dr. Hosny, for all your help!
